Disposable PE Gloves Perfect for a variety of kitchen tasks, disposable gloves are a great way to ensure your staff is practicing proper food safety procedures. These gloves can easily be put on and taken off so you're not being held up when moving between different tasks throughout the day! Single Size Great for food service applications, because they're easy to remove, which is pertinent in the kitchen where constant glove-changing is required. Latex-Free Put your latex-allergic customers at ease. These gloves are 100% latex free, making them the perfect option for food handling. Perfect for Light-Duty Tasks Ideal for food service operation, these gloves are perfect for tossing salads and making ready-to-order sandwiches. Disposable For added convenience, they are also disposable so you can easily throw them away after each use to keep your work environment clean and organized.
